title: Core-size and geometry versus toxicity in small amino terminated PAMAM dendrimers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28684-28692
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02020K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Claus Bøge Hansen, Anna Janaszewska, Monika Dąbrzalska, Monika Marcinkowska, Barbara Klajnert-Maculewicz, Jørn Bolstad Christensen
The toxicity of 6 small dendrimers has been investigated in three different human cancer cell lines (HeLa, MCF-7, THP-1) and the endothelial skin cell line HMEC-1 in order to evaluate their potential as vehicles for drug delivery.
